desc: Custom design & ready to wear designer wedding dresses and matric dance dresses made in Cape Town.

layout.text: At Molteno Couture, we take the time to understand and celebrate how each woman chooses to show up in the world. Whether you are looking for a wedding dress or matric dance dress, we are here to give you a voice through our luxurious, creative collaboration to express all that makes you, uniquely you.
